title: Head of Marketing
text:
AFRICA EXPERIENCE is a tour operating business with ground-handling offices in Tanzania, Kenya, South Africa and Namibia. Since 2007, we take our guests on exciting safaris and adventurous trekking tours in East and Southern Africa. After growing organically and establishing our operations offices in the different destinations, we are now looking to develop a common brand identity and lay the strategic foundations for our marketing efforts in the next five to ten years.

We are looking for an experienced person as the Head of Marketing in our head-office in Somerset West (South Africa) to develop, implement and oversee our marketing strategy, to champion our internal and external brand identity as well as to contribute and support product development and sales execution. This position entails a dual reporting line to the General Manager and the company owner.

Your responsibilities would include
